Text: Thank you so much for your kind given what i exactly need
man, I've copied the files from "crack" folder into instalation directory and is still saying "trial version"... Can you give us a hint?
Crap only a trial version even with the crack

It's working!

1. install eDraw

2. copy everything from "crack" folder to your eDraw installation folder (it should ask you to overwrite 3 files).

3. disable your internet connection and run eDraw

4. in program go to Help -> register

5. chose "manually activate" and copy/paste licence code (123412341234123412341234).

6. Click "OK" and restart the program

After this, run the program and everything should be ok, your program should be activated ;)

Took me 5min. to figure this out. :)

Good luck chaps! Keep seeding ;)
Thanks bro.....Its work like a charm ..cos i follow the procedure and its work for me... 5 star ranks for u ...great

Hi Sergio3d: A text change suggestion:
from original:
5. chose "manually activate" and copy/paste licence code (123412341234123412341234).
to
5. License name and License Code are shown. Click over "Activate". Return from edraw site error message. Chose "manually activate" and copy/paste Pass code: 555E-123B-ABC9. 

Voila. Enjoy. It's OK.
